name: Docker cgroup memory allocation failure
description: Docker containers failing to start with cgroup memory allocation error.

scan.details: Checks for related error messages and missing settings.
steps: Checks if `cgroup.memory=nokmem` is present on the `GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX` parameter in `/etc/default/grub`
Checks if there are `cgroup.*cannot allocate memory` messages on kubernetes pods

patch.details: Apply kernel settings on grub's configuration
